title: Noteworthy ETF Outflows: IDV - Nasdaq.com
text: Looking today at week-over-week shares outstanding changes among the universe of ETFs covered at ETF Channel , one standout is the iShares International Select Dividend ETF (Symbol: IDV) where we have detected an approximate $69.9 million dollar outflow -- that's a 1.7% decrease week over week (from 140,600,000 to 138,250,000). The chart below shows the one year price performance of IDV, versus its 200 day moving average:
